$comment: ⚠️ DEPLOYMENT DISABLED - This Vercel project is currently disabled to prevent multiple simultaneous builds. Only Portfolio OS (root vercel.json) should be deployed. Delete this project from Vercel dashboard.
buildCommand: cd ../.. && pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=apps/dashboard/prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm turbo run build --filter=@mindware-blog/dashboard...
